project_descr: The project aims at furthering the exercise of rights by young women in Brazil, working in three axes: empowerment of young women; strengthening the National Secretariat of Youth; sensitizing media professionals on gender equality and youth women issues.

outputs.output_descr: BRA/13/007 - YOUNG WOMEN ARE MORE ORGANIZED, INFORMED AND EMPOWERED FOR EFFECTIVE POLITICAL PARTICIPATION
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management

project_title: bra/13/007 expanding the rights of young brazilian women
